org.apache.hadoop.fs.ftp
类 FTPFileSystem

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem
          org.apache.hadoop.fs.ftp.FTPFileSystem
所有已实现的接口：
Closeable, Configurable
@InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public class FTPFileSystem
extends FileSystem

A FileSystem backed by an FTP client provided by Apache Commons Net.

方法详细信息

initialize

public void initialize(URI uri,
                       Configuration conf)
                throws IOException
从类 FileSystem 复制的描述
Called after a new FileSystem instance is constructed.

覆盖：
类 FileSystem 中的 initialize
参数：
uri - a uri whose authority section names the host, port, etc. for this FileSystem
conf - the configuration
抛出：
IOException

open

                              int bufferSize)
                       throws IOException
从类 FileSystem 复制的描述
Opens an FSDataInputStream at the indicated Path.

指定者：
类 FileSystem 中的 open
参数：
file - the file name to open
bufferSize - the size of the buffer to be used.
抛出：
IOException

create

public FSDataOutputStream create(Path file,
                                 FsPermission permission,
                                 boolean overwrite,
                                 int bufferSize,
                                 short replication,
                                 long blockSize,
                                 Progressable progress)
                          throws IOException
A stream obtained via this call must be closed before using other APIs of this class or else the invocation will block.

指定者：
类 FileSystem 中的 create
参数：
file - the file name to open
overwrite - if a file with this name already exists, then if true, the file will be overwritten, and if false an error will be thrown.
bufferSize - the size of the buffer to be used.
replication - required block replication for the file.
抛出：
IOException
另请参见：
FileSystem.setPermission(Path, FsPermission)

append

public FSDataOutputStream append(Path f,
                                 int bufferSize,
                                 Progressable progress)
                          throws IOException
This optional operation is not yet supported.

指定者：
类 FileSystem 中的 append
参数：
f - the existing file to be appended.
bufferSize - the size of the buffer to be used.
progress - for reporting progress if it is not null.
抛出：
IOException

delete

public boolean delete(Path file,
                      boolean recursive)
               throws IOException
从类 FileSystem 复制的描述
Delete a file.

指定者：
类 FileSystem 中的 delete
参数：
file - the path to delete.
recursive - if path is a directory and set to true, the directory is deleted else throws an exception. In case of a file the recursive can be set to either true or false.
返回：
true if delete is successful else false.
抛出：
IOException

file - given path

the statuses of the files/directories in the given patch

IOException

mkdirs

public boolean mkdirs(Path file,
                      FsPermission permission)
               throws IOException
从类 FileSystem 复制的描述
Make the given file and all non-existent parents into directories. Has the semantics of Unix 'mkdir -p'. Existence of the directory hierarchy is not an error.

指定者：
类 FileSystem 中的 mkdirs
抛出：
IOException

rename

public boolean rename(Path src,
                      Path dst)
               throws IOException
从类 FileSystem 复制的描述
Renames Path src to Path dst. Can take place on local fs or remote DFS.

指定者：
类 FileSystem 中的 rename
返回：
true if rename is successful
抛出：
IOException - on failure

getHomeDirectory

public Path getHomeDirectory()
从类 FileSystem 复制的描述
Return the current user's home directory in this filesystem. The default implementation returns "/user/$USER/".

覆盖：
类 FileSystem 中的 getHomeDirectory

setWorkingDirectory

public void setWorkingDirectory(Path newDir)
从类 FileSystem 复制的描述
Set the current working directory for the given file system. All relative paths will be resolved relative to it.

指定者：
类 FileSystem 中的 setWorkingDirectory
